description:
Rindou Hotaru is the subhead of Kanagawa City. She has a calm and composed disposition, and is only nice to http://anidb.net/ch78973 [Hime]. Her eyes are so uncommonly observant that she can read her opponents` actions. Her other strong point is her observation of Hime. Her weapon is a katana, and her power is that she can make contact through her eyes.
Source: ANN
name: Rindou Hotaru
